subject: Order #SSN1422 and Order #SSN1349
description_text:
Hello, Simonn, I would like to sell my pedals, as well as the plates and
elastomers. I would like to know how I can give the buyer the two-year
warranty.

conversations.body_text: Hi Gaetan Martinez,  Regarding the connection issue, please install Todesk, and we can schedule a time for me to assist you remotely. It usually takes only 2–3 minutes to identify and fix the problem. If it turns out to be an issue with the adjustable hydraulic rod, we will send you a new one free of charge via express shipping. After the issue is resolved, we will also provide a USD compensation as a token of our apology.

Thank you, I will do that.

Le sam. 7 juin 2025 à 02:26, service@simsonn.com
你好，Gaetan Martinez，  我们期待您的回复。我们的工程师将立即通过 ToDesk 协助您解决问题。
ID 号为 235 和 252 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单235  
      主题: Cancel Order #SSN1647  
      描述:  I want to cancel my Order #SSN1647 because I don't need the product
此工单已关闭并合并到工单 237 中

合并来自工单252  
      主题: Cancel my Order #SSN1647  
      描述:  Please cancel my Order #SSN1647 because I don't need the product because my pedals are broke so please cancel it and refund me
此工单已关闭并合并到工单 237 中

C’est bon le pédalier est réparé merci beaucoup !

Le lun. 9 juin 2025 à 05:36, service@simsonn.com
Hi Gaetan Martinez,    Glad to hear the good news, we will send you a replacement for your hydraulic rod and refund you $15 as compensation. Thank you for your feedback!

That's great, thank you very much.

Le lun. 9 juin 2025 à 12:46, service@simsonn.com
你好，Gaetan Martinez，  请问您为什么考虑出售这些踏板？是因为您对它们不满意吗？请使用您的订单邮箱联系我们，我们将根据您的订单日期提供售后服务。
ID 号为 235, 237 和 252 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单235  
      主题: Cancel Order #SSN1647  
      描述:  I want to cancel my Order #SSN1647 because I don't need the product

合并来自工单237  
      主题: Return Order #SSN1422 and Order #SSN1349  
      描述:  I ordered my pedal set on April 22nd, but it is impossible to play with it because it is not recognized by the application. In addition, the brake is leaking oil. I have sent you several emails without any response. I would just like to return the pedal set and be reimbursed because it is unusable. Thank you for your understanding. Looking forward to it! 
 36513705-8A9B-4B6B-ADBD-90FF9C2503A9.mp4
 All the proof is sent in this email.

合并来自工单252  
      主题: Cancel my Order #SSN1647  
      描述:  Please cancel my Order #SSN1647 because I don't need the product because my pedals are broke so please cancel it and refund me

No I just want to sell it, please tell how i can transfer my 2 years
garanty

Le mer. 11 juin 2025 à 08:01, service@simsonn.com
Hi Gaetan Martinez,  You just need to give the buyer your proof of purchase (a screenshot of the order) and present the corresponding proof when the time comes to get the warranty.
